text: Zienia Merton (11 December 1945 â€“ 14 September 2018) was a Burmese-British actress. She was raised in Singapore, Borneo, Portugal, and England. She was probably best known for playing Sandra Benes in Space: 1999. Merton also starred in Grange Hill, Return of the Saint (1979), Bergerac (1983), Tenko (1984), Dempsey & Makepeace (1985), Lovejoy (1986), Crime Traveller (1997), Doctors (2001), Dinotopia (2002), Casualty (1986 - 2002), EastEnders (1998 - 2003), The Bill (1999 - 2005), Judge John Deed (2006), Coronation Street (2008) and Wire in the Blood (2008). Morton died on 14 September 2018 at the age of 72. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1945 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Burmese actors Category:British movie actors Category:British television actors Category:British stage actors
title: Zienia Merton
